Step #1: Go to: [Bloodforge, Workshop - 26091]

Step #2: With your in your hand --> Ask assistant about * Types are damage, critical or sighting

He will give you a service point quote. (Prices will vary) * Estimated Costs: * Next Service: 110 bloodscrip * Next 5 Services: 550 bloodscrip * Next 10 Services: 1237 bloodscrip * Next 15 Services: 2887 bloodscrip * Next 20 Services: 4812 bloodscrip * Next 25 Services: 10862 bloodscrip

Step 3: If you are satisfied with the costs, and you have received an invitation to the smithy. --> go archway.

Step 4: You are now at the blacksmith. --> Ask blacksmith about * He will give you the same information that the assistant gave you and ask you to confirm. * If you have REDEEMed enough bloodscrip to pay for the service.

Step 5: Ask blacksmith about confirm * You will pay the blacksmith, and will have used 1 SP for that item. * Repeat steps 4 and 5 up to 25 times per item.

What do service points get me? * https://forums.elanthia.online/topic/390/wps-chart

  • SPECIAL NOTE

This is how the costs progressed for me. (But not on this item.)

  • For service - 1,2,3,4,5 - the cost was 251
  • For service - 6,7,8,9,10 - the cost was 314
  • For service - 11,12,13,14,15 - the cost was 755
  • For service - 16,17,18,19,20 - the cost was 881
  • For service - 21 - the cost was 1259
  • For service - 22 - the cost was 2015
  • For service - 23 - the cost was 2770
  • For service - 24 - the cost was 3526
  • For service - 25 - the cost was 4282

go arch A dwarven blacksmith assistant steps in front of you and states, "Alastir, before I review my list, be sure you're absolutely certain that you're prepared to do business with the blacksmith. You'll need to earn a new invite should you go in and leave." The assistant continues, "If you're absolutely sure you're ready, then just head inside again within ten seconds."

go arch A dwarven blacksmith assistant reviews a list and exclaims, "Ah, Alastir, follow me!" The assistant escorts you through a narrow archway leading toward the smithy and says, "If you want to come back, you'll need to earn another invite."

[Bloodforge, Smithy - ] Bursts of heat drift in from an adjacent room, and a sulfuric scent lingers in the air. A blackened pine sawhorse draped with layers of thick padding is nudged against a large worktable cluttered with numerous knives, tongs, chisels, and a variety of other instruments. Burning embers escape from a small furnace in a fiery crimson spray and threaten to set the worktable ablaze. You also see an old dwarven blacksmith. Obvious exits: out >

ask blacksmith about critical An old dwarven blacksmith scribles a hasty bill of work and slides it over for you to read.

|-----------------Summary------------------| Item: some full leather Modified Padding Type: Critical Services to be Performed: 1 Current Service Window Count: 0 Service Window Reset: 0d 0h 0m Service Cost: 110 bloodscrip |------------------------------------------|

An old dwarven blacksmith grumbles, "If ya agree with all that, ask me about CONFIRMing the sale. Remember, once ya CONFIRM, ya pay up and all sales are FINAL!" >

ask blacksmith about confirm You hand an old dwarven blacksmith 110 bloodscip. An old dwarven blacksmith takes your white leather shirt from you and limps to the forge. It quickly returns, idly polishing it with a dirty rag as it hands it back to you.
